hibernate-mapping.sql-query: select t2.folder_uuid as folder_uuid from dms_folder_configuration t2 where t2.folder_uuid = :folderUuid and exists ( select distinct oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_object_assign_role_item oari, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra <if sids?? && (sids?size > 1000)>, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID </if> where oar.uuid = oari.assign_role_uuid and oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action in(:actions) <if sids?? && (sids?size > 1000)> and oari.org_id = u_.org_id <else> and oari.org_id in(:sids) </if> and oar.object_identity_uuid = t2.ref_object_identity_uuid )

select t2.folder_uuid as folder_uuid from dms_folder_configuration t2 where t2.folder_uuid = :folderUuid and exists ( select distinct oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_object_assign_role_item oari, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra <if sids?? && (sids?size > 1000)>, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID </if> where oar.uuid = oari.assign_role_uuid and oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and r.id in(:dmsRoleIds) <if sids?? && (sids?size > 1000)> and oari.org_id = u_.org_id <else> and oari.org_id in(:sids) </if> and oar.object_identity_uuid = t2.ref_object_identity_uuid )

select distinct c_.folder_uuid from (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.parent_uuid = :folderUuid and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_ where c_.folder_uuid not in (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.parent_uuid = :folderUuid and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid)

select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.parent_uuid = :folderUuid and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid

select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.parent_uuid = :folderUuid and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid

select distinct c_.folder_uuid from (select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_ where c_.folder_uuid not in (select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid)

select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid

select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid

select distinct c_.folder_uuid from (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> <if isBlank(fileStatusField)>and f_.status <> '0'</if> ) fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_ where c_.folder_uuid not in (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> <if isBlank(fileStatusField)>and f_.status <> '0'</if> ) fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid)

select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> <if isBlank(fileStatusField)>and f_.status <> '0'</if> ) fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid

select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> <if isBlank(fileStatusField)>and f_.status <> '0'</if> ) fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid

select distinct c_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, '1' as file_type from (select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_ where c_.folder_uuid not in (select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) union all select c_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, '2' as file_type from (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_ where c_.folder_uuid not in (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid)

select distinct c_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, '1' as file_type from (select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_ union all select c_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, '2' as file_type from (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select oar.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role oar, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where oar.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and oar.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and oar.permit = 'Y' and (oar.deny <> 'Y' or oar.deny is null)) c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_

select distinct c_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, '1' as file_type from (select fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '/%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '/%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFolder' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_ union all select c_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, '2' as file_type from (select distinct fc.folder_uuid from (select fc_.folder_uuid as folder_uuid, fc_.ref_object_identity_uuid as ref_object_identity_uuid from dms_folder_configuration fc_ inner join dms_folder f_ on fc_.folder_uuid = f_.uuid and f_.uuid_path like <if isNotBlank(uuidPath)> concat(:uuidPath, '%') <else> concat('%/', :folderUuid, '%') </if> and f_.status <> '0') fc inner join (select t.object_identity_uuid from dms_object_assign_role t, dms_role r, dms_role_action ra, (${userOrgIdsTemplate}) u_ -- 用户相关ID where t.role_uuid = r.uuid and r.uuid = ra.role_uuid and ra.action = 'readFile' and t.org_ids like concat('%', u_.org_id,'%') and t.deny = 'Y') c2 on fc.ref_object_identity_uuid = c2.object_identity_uuid) c_
